Name: Zavix Tower
About the game: Zavix Tower is a challenging fantasy roguelike turn-based CRPG set in a never ending tower! Recruit, level, gear up, and develop a group powerful adventurers as you climb the tower. 7 Playable Hero Classes More than 100 Skills More than 30 Unique Mobs. 10 Unique Bosses Large Talent Trees For Each Class Tons Of Gear (limitless) Endless Tower Can you defeat the Demons and cleanse Zavix Tower?
